title: Why does rito hate Taliyah so much
body: I did that maths and her "buff" they're giving her makes her do less damage at the same amount of AP. Why the hell does rito keep nerfing Taliyah when she's already in a shitter.

replies.body:
It is a buff.

I see that BarryButcher has done a good job of explaining it, but he has missed part of it out, so ill go over that part.

_____________

This is what BarryButcher covered _(but ill use higher numbers, for a different perspective)_:

lets give taliyah 500 AP _(which is a decent amount for someone as tanky as her)_

Old Q:
40% of 500 AP = 200 
200 + 140 = 340
So 1st rock = 340 dmg
2nd/3rd/4th/5th rocks: 50% of 340 = 170
170 x 4 = 680
680 + 340 = 1020

**Total Q damage: 1020**

New Q: 
45% of 500 Ap = 225
225 + 170 = 395
So 1st rock = 395 dmg
2nd/3rd/4th/5th rocks: 40% of 395 = 158
158 x 4 = 632
632 + 395 = 1027

**Total Q damage: 1027**

It shows that if you hit all 5 rocks, the buff is very very small _(and with higher amounts of AP, is a nerf)_

_____________

However it buffs her damage if she hits LESS than 5 rocks _(which if we are honest, is a fair amount of the time.)_ 
this is where the true buff is. 

Lets look at the previous equation but with less rocks 

Old Q: 
1st rock = 340 + 170 + 170 = 680
2nd rock = 170
3rd rock = 170
4th rock = 0 (miss)
5th rock = 0 (miss)

340 + 170 + 170 + 0 + 0 = 680

**Total damage: 680**

New Q
1st rock = 395
2nd rock = 170
3rd rock = 170
4th rock = 0 (miss)
5th rock = 0 (miss)

395 + 158 + 158 = 711

**Total damage: 711**

So unless you hit all 5 rocks every time you Q and you have over 500 AP, its actually quite a snug little buff for her. 
If you are building glass cannon Taliyah (which isn't a good idea) then she will have lots of AP, and this will end up nerfing her damage slightly. But if you're building her regularly, this is a buff. 

_Personally, i don't think Taliyah needed buffs at all, she is very strong, and in my opinion is perfect they way she is and i don't think Riot should go messing around with her, (if anything she probably needs a nerf). _

**TL;DR:** This buff changes very little if you hit all 5 rocks. But it gives her more damage if you only land a few rocks.
